workoutText: Maximum focus on using arm and shoulder muscles. Take at least 2 hours.

exercise.details: Curls, 20 lbs, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break
Bench Press, 120 lbs, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break
Pushups, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break
Pullups, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break
Tricep Dips, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break

workoutText: Focus on strengthening your leg muscles. Take at least 1.5 hours.

exercise.details: Squats, 150 lbs, 5 sets of 10, take 1 min break
Lunges, bodyweight, 4 sets of 12 (each leg), take 30 sec break
Leg Press, 200 lbs, 5 sets of 15, take 1 min break
Calf Raises, bodyweight, 5 sets of 20, take 30 sec break
Leg Extensions, 100 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break

workoutText: Focus on strengthening your core muscles. Take at least 1 hour.

exercise.details: Plank, hold for 1 minute, rest for 30 seconds, repeat 5 times
Russian Twists, 10 lbs, 3 sets of 20 (each side), take 30 sec break
Crunches, 4 sets of 15, take 30 sec break
Hanging Leg Raises, 4 sets of 12, take 1 min break
Bicycle Crunches, 4 sets of 20 (each side), take 30 sec break

workoutText: Focus on cardiovascular endurance. Take at least 1 hour.

exercise.details: Running, 30 minutes at a moderate pace
Cycling, 45 minutes on a stationary bike
Jumping Jacks, 4 sets of 25, take 30 sec break
Burpees, 4 sets of 10, take 1 min break
High Knees, 3 sets of 30 seconds, take 30 sec break

workoutText: Focus on strengthening your upper body muscles. Take at least 1.5 hours.

exercise.details: Dumbbell Shoulder Press, 20 lbs each, 5 sets of 12, take 1 min break
Dumbbell Rows, 30 lbs each, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break
Chest Flys, 15 lbs each, 4 sets of 15, take 30 sec break
Overhead Tricep Extensions, 15 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break
Lat Pulldowns, 80 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 1 min break

workoutText: Target multiple muscle groups with this full body circuit. Take at least 1.5 hours.

exercise.details: Squats, 100 lbs, 5 sets of 10, take 1 min break
Pushups, 5 sets of 15, take 30 sec break
Dumbbell Lunges, 15 lbs each, 4 sets of 12 (each leg), take 30 sec break
Bent Over Rows, 40 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break
Plank, hold for 1 minute, rest for 30 seconds, repeat 4 times

workoutText: Focus on building strength with heavy weights. Take at least 2 hours.

exercise.details: Deadlifts, 200 lbs, 5 sets of 5, take 2 min break
Bench Press, 150 lbs, 5 sets of 5, take 2 min break
Squats, 180 lbs, 5 sets of 5, take 2 min break
Barbell Rows, 120 lbs, 5 sets of 5, take 2 min break
Overhead Press, 80 lbs, 5 sets of 5, take 2 min break

workoutText: Focus on your back and bicep muscles. Take at least 1.5 hours.

exercise.details: Wide Grip Pullups, 4 sets of 10, take 30 sec break
Barbell Curls, 50 lbs, 5 sets of 12, take 1 min break
Dumbbell Rows, 40 lbs each, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break
Hammer Curls, 25 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 30 sec break
Lat Pulldowns, 80 lbs, 4 sets of 12, take 1 min break

workoutText: Focus on improving endurance with high-rep exercises. Take at least 1.5 hours.

exercise.details: Burpees, 4 sets of 20, take 30 sec break
Mountain Climbers, 3 sets of 30 seconds, take 30 sec break
Box Jumps, 4 sets of 10, take 30 sec break
Russian Twists, bodyweight, 4 sets of 20 (each side), take 30 sec break
Jumping Lunges, 4 sets of 15 (each leg), take 30 sec break

workoutText: Engage in a high-intensity interval training (HIIT) session for a full-body workout. Take at least 1 hour.

exercise.details: Jumping Jacks, 1 minute
Squat Jumps, 4 sets of 15, take 30 sec break
Pushups, 4 sets of 15, take 30 sec break
Mountain Climbers, 4 sets of 20 (each leg), take 30 sec break
Plank, hold for 1 minute, rest for 30 seconds, repeat 4 times
